concepts.concept_name: Remainder theorem: remainder when f(x) is divided by (x - a) is f(a)
Factor theorem: (x - a) is a factor of f(x) if and only if f(a) = 0

Factorisation using synthetic division method

in_scope: Remainder theorem for polynomials up to degree 3

out_of_scope: Polynomials of degree greater than 3 (Beyond ICSE scope)

concepts.concept_name: Standard form ax^2 + bx + c = 0 and solution by factorisation
Solution by completing the square
Solution using the quadratic formula
Nature of roots using discriminant (b^2 - 4ac)

in_scope: Solving by factorisation (splitting the middle term)

concepts.concept_name: Componendo and dividendo property

concepts.concept_name: General term of an AP: a_n = a + (n-1)d
Sum of first n terms: S_n = n/2 [2a + (n-1)d]

concepts.concept_name: Angle in a semicircle is 90 degrees

concepts.concept_name: Mean by direct, assumed-mean, and step-deviation methods

in_scope: Assumed-mean method: mean = A + sum(fi*di) / sum(fi)
Step-deviation method: mean = A + (sum(fi*ui) / sum(fi)) * h

concepts.concept_name: Random experiments, outcomes, and sample space
